description: The app is great and i recomend it for people who enjoy console chating. Might be a bit hard to get used by it is possible.
summary: Recomended for people who enjoy console-like things

description: When I use Atox on an android to communicate with my Linux qtox, using qtox I must create a password and user name but on android that is not required. When calling from qtox to atox it does the atox device has a accept, deny message which appears for a short time and disappears even though the other qtox machine is still ringing.
